questions.question: In a two sample t-test for independent samples, the degree of freedom are calculated as:

answers.a: The product of sample sizes of both groups.
answers.b: The difference between the sample sizes of both groups.
answers.c: The sum of sample sizes of both groups.
answers.d: The sum of the degrees of freedom for each groups.

questions.question: The p-value in a t-test represents

answers.a: The probability of committing a type Ⅰ error
answers.b: The probability of observing the data if the null hypothesis is true
answers.c: The probability of observing the data if the alternative hypothesis is true
answers.d: The probability of committing type ⅠⅠ error

questions.question: A t-test with large effect size and small sample size is likely to have
